mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKMARK (B_NO, M_NO, BC_NO) VALUES (SEQ_BOOKMARK.NEXTVAL, #{m_no}, #{bc_no})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOOKMARK WHERE M_NO = #{m_no} AND BC_NO = #{bc_no}
mapper.select: SELECT b.bc_no, b.bc_name, b.bc_location, b.bc_office, b.bc_image FROM beach b JOIN bookmark bm ON b.bc_no = bm.bc_no WHERE bm.m_no = #{m_no} ORDER BY bm.b_no DESC -- 최근에 찜한 순서대로
